name: 江怡君
objective:
本課程旨在有效提升學生運用英文於工程實務之技巧與能力。主要包括： 一、撰寫個人英文履歷及簡歷。
二、閱讀通俗科技文章的能力(含心得報告)。
三、使用英文進行簡報的技巧與能力。
四、撰寫英文簡報資料的技巧與能力。
五、撰寫工作報告的技巧與能力。
本課程授課包括約三分之一的時間在語言教室練習職場英語。

scorePolicy:
以下說明如有任何疑義或未說明周全之處，授課教師擁有最終及惟一解釋權。
Weekly Quizzes * 30% (每週小考)
Assignments: CV and Resume * 10% (履歷)
Translation (英進中翻譯) * 15% (around 350 words)
Report * 15% (專題報告)
Presentation * 30% (專題口頭報告)
(預習和功課) Students are required to do homework and take notes in class. The instructor will check students’ notes and homework at irregular intervals. If a student is found to not taken notes or done homework, 20 points will be deducted from his or her quiz that week.
(小考和補考) Quizzes are always administered at the beginning of the class. Late students can ask for make-up quizzes administered by the teaching assistant, but 20 points will be automatically deducted.　For all students, one lowest quiz grade needs not to be factored into the calculation. An absent student cannot ask for a make-up quiz. Yet, for an absent student to qualify for the right, he or she must undergo the procedures required by the school to ask for a sick leave or a leave for personal reasons. 
(作業預繳) Students can decide whether or not he or she wants to submit drafts of assignments to the instructor for writing advice but not correction before the deadline.
(小老師) Teaching assistant will be awarded 3 bonus points to his or her final grade.
(遲交作業) Late assignments will receive a penalty of ten points per day.
(作弊或抄襲) Any student caught cheating or plagiarizing in quizzes, exams, or projects will be given a zero for his or her final grade without any room of negotiation.
materials:
Required—工程英文與實務。
Optional (popular scientific magazines and journals)—Scientific America, New Scientist, Discover, Popular Science, Newton, etc.
